keyPolicies.policyDescription: Immigration must be controlled so that it has a positive and productive effect on our society and not the negative impact it is currently having.

We need to bring justice back into our criminal justice system. Sentencing needs to be relevant to the crime, sentences should be served for the duration, and the prison regime should be reflective of its purpose.

issues.brexitEurope: Our country has been disposed of - sent to the European Union without us even being asked. We have lost all our country's treasures, even the right to rule ourselves. All that is left is our democracy and freedom, don't let them give that away too.
issues.immigration: Immigration must be controlled so that it has a positive and productive effect on our society and not the negative impact it is currently having.

leaflet.personalStatement: Stand with me and fight for your country and its independence.

images.caption: Election communication for the UK Independence Party - Straight talking. Vote UKIP.
